sourcesContent: import{jsxs as e,jsx as o}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{FederatedIdentityProviders as i,translate as t}from"@aws-amplify/ui";import{Divider as r}from"../../../primitives/Divider/Divider.js";import{Flex as n}from"../../../primitives/Flex/Flex.js";import{useAuthenticator as s}from"../hooks/useAuthenticator/index.js";import{FederatedSignInButton as a}from"./FederatedSignInButtons/FederatedSignInButton.js";function p(){const{_state:p,route:c}=s((e=>[e.route])),{socialProviders:m=[]}=p.context.config;if(0===m.length)return null;const l="signUp"===c?"Up":"In";return e(n,Object.assign({direction:"column",padding:"0 0 1rem 0",className:"federated-sign-in-container"},{children:[m.map((e=>{switch(e){case"amazon":return o(a,{icon:"amazon",provider:i.Amazon,text:t(`Sign ${l} with Amazon`)},e);case"apple":return o(a,{icon:"apple",provider:i.Apple,text:t(`Sign ${l} with Apple`)},e);case"facebook":return o(a,{icon:"facebook",provider:i.Facebook,text:t(`Sign ${l} with Facebook`)},e);case"google":return o(a,{icon:"google",provider:i.Google,text:t(`Sign ${l} with Google`)},e);default:console.error(`Authenticator does not support ${e}. Please open an issue: https://github.com/aws-amplify/amplify-ui/issues/choose`)}})),o(r,{size:"small",label:"or"})]}))}export{p as FederatedSignIn};
